scripts.postinstall: cd vue-app && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.vue-build: echo 'Running vue-build' && cd server && rm -rf ./dist && cd ../vue-app && npm run build && mv dist ../server/. && cd ../
scripts.server-start: echo 'Running server-start' && cd server && npm run prod
scripts.start: npm run vue-build && npm run server-start
